title: New Electric Buses Added to Cape Town Fleet
summary: The city has introduced 50 new electric buses to reduce carbon emissions.
content: The city has introduced 50 new electric buses to reduce carbon emissions. This rollout expands cleaner urban mobility options and may improve reliability on selected routes.

metaDescription: Cape Town has introduced 50 electric buses to support cleaner public transport operations.

title: Gautrain Expansion Routes Announced
summary: New stations planned for Soweto and Fourways by 2028.
content: New stations planned for Soweto and Fourways by 2028. The proposed expansion aims to improve accessibility and network reach for commuters across Gauteng.

metaDescription: Planned Gautrain expansion routes include future stations in Soweto and Fourways.

title: E-Hailing Regulations Update
summary: New safety features now mandatory for all e-hailing drivers.
content: New safety features now mandatory for all e-hailing drivers. The update focuses on passenger protection requirements and compliance obligations for operators.
